title: Advancing Financial Inclusion Through Women's Economic Empowerment
summary: More than 2 billion people, a majority of which are women, are currently financially excluded. Women are more than twice as likely to be financially excluded as men, and efforts to support their financial inclusion are bolstered by compelling research that shows investments in women contribute to greater development achievements. See examples of the Citi Foundation's investments in women here.
tag-1: Advancing Financial Inclusion Through Women's Economic Empowerment
